topics.title: Gluon Protocol Introduction and Overview
topics.summary: Bruno introduces Gluon as a new stablecoin protocol with Gluon Golden Ergo as its first implementation - an autonomous gold-backed stablecoin. He directs users to gluon.gold to try the protocol and references previous Ergo summit talks for detailed explanations.

topics.title: Security Audit Results and Protocol Verification
topics.summary: The Gluon implementation on Ergo was independently audited by Krasavice Blazen with no vulnerabilities found. The audit included both code inspection and protocol simulation using Python.

topics.title: Mathematical Proofs and Formal Verification Progress
topics.summary: Five out of six stability theorems have been proven with the last nearly complete. The team is formally verifying proofs in Coq, which is more time-consuming than expected, requiring almost 1000 lines of code for theorem five. Plans include submitting to the first stability workshop.

topics.title: New Frontend Release and User Experience Improvements
topics.summary: A new beta frontend has been released replacing the old version with significant improvements including no backend dependency for better decentralization, transparent fee calculations, protocol state dashboard, and swap-style UI/UX. Users can join the Gluon Gold Telegram for more information.
